review: This is a great little box. Now I can get rid of the premium movie channels that only repeat the same movies over and over

review: far and above what I expected,excellent.

review: No more switching from Blu Ray player to view Netflix and Wii to view Amazon prime.  Easy  to setup and use
author: Kurt Hartman

review: Cutting off my cable provider.  What more could someone want.

review: Great product! It was super easy to set up and the people I bought it for seem to be having a great time with it.

review: Once you give the fire some of you time by exploring, it catches on quick to your likes.. Comcast has a. little trouble keeping up with it. As a whole  we love it.
author: Phil A. Hersey "Woodman"

review: Sometimes, I can't get it to work.  Maybe it's user error, but a better instruction manual should come with the system.

review: The Amazon fire was really ease to hook. I am enjoying it.
